2018 Annual Report

Across the globe, our employees have used our three strategic priorities -- reduce complexity, drive returns and strengthen the balance sheet -- as the building blocks for Alcoa's stronger foundation. Our 2018 Annual Report highlights our efforts to improve safety, our operations and our balance sheet to ensure Alcoa's long, bright future.

View Report

About Alcoa ... Pioneer, Innovator, Leader

Please enable targeting cookies to watch videos. You can enable targeting cookies on our Cookie Policy page.

OUR CAPABILITIES

We invented the aluminum industry and continue to lead in the innovation of new technologies. We are the best operators in the industry creating superior value for our customers.

Bauxite

Among the world's largest bauxite producers.

Learn More

Alumina

Home of an attractive global alumina refining system.

Learn More

Optimized aluminum portfolio.

WORK FOR US

Since 1888, the people of Alcoa have partnered to create innovative and sustainable solutions that move the world forward. We created the aluminum industry, and will continue to define and advance it.
